subject: Re: Off Topic: Spring Testing
msgSnippet: SpringJUnit4ClassRunner does this by default. The locations field of @ContextConfigurations is actually the key into the cached spring contexts.
messageBody:
SpringJUnit4ClassRunner does this by default. The "locations" field of @ContextConfigurations is actually the key into the cached spring contexts.
